title: Nuovo Team Professionale in cerca di Players seri
body:
Looking for players Diamond 4 and above to tryout and be choosen for the main team. Add me IGN: PROPHET Weel

PROPHETS eSports is a brand new org aspiring to be one one of the best organization in europe for competitive PROFESSIONAL gaming. We want to be build the best team to compete in european tournaments and make a great name of it. By best i mean strong players, friendship with each other in and outside the game, great cooperation with each and every member, and last but not least being able to put alot of effort and energy in this team.

replies.body: Probably This post will be Removed, pls write  in the english area
